remarks: A version of ~ mulc1cncf using bound-variable hypotheses instead of distinct variable conditions.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 30-Jun-2017.)
statement:
mulc1cncfg.1 $e |- F/_ x F $.
mulc1cncfg.2 $e |- F/ x ph $.
mulc1cncfg.3 $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( A -cn-> CC ) ) $.
mulc1cncfg.4 $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
mulc1cncfg $p |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> ( B x. ( F ` x ) ) ) e. ( A -cn-> CC ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
